incidents.name: 500 Errors on Flex Custom Plugins

incident_updates.body: Twilio Functions & Assets was degraded for 30 minutes between 05:00 and 05:30 Pacific Time on 26/04/2023. During this period of time, a subset of customers may have experienced 5xx while fetching assets for plugins. Flex Insights was not impacted and was usable for customers during this time. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Functions & Assets. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with a subset of our voice APIs

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue with a subset of our voice APIs triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with a subset of our voice APIs. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Billing Events Missing Video Recordings

incident_updates.body: Twilio billing was degraded where storing video recordings were affected between March 16th at 11:00 am to April 13th at 10:00 am Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have been underbilled for part of March. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VIDEO - Recordings

incidents.name: Some International Calls Might Have Failed Due to a Parsing Error

incident_updates.body: Due to a software update, some international To numbers were incorrectly parsed for 20 hours and 47 minutes between 17:14 on 04/20/2023 and 12:01 on 04/21/2023 Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced calls failures.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with voice calls got blocked. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Flex Overview Page in Admin Console Fails to Load

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex was degraded for 1 hour between 12:00 AM and 1:00 AM Pacific Time on April 18th, 2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced loading failures when trying to access the Flex overview page in admin console. The issue has now been resolved.
